title: Animated Product Card
description: Create an expandable product card that animates when tapped.
instructions: Build a product card that expands when tapped to show more details. Use AnimatedContainer for the size change, AnimatedOpacity to fade in the description, and AnimatedRotation to spin the expand/collapse icon.

hints.text: Start with AnimatedContainer and toggle height based on _isExpanded
Wrap the description in AnimatedOpacity with opacity 1.0 or 0.0

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to add duration to animated widgets
commonMistakes.consequence: Animation won't work - duration is required

commonMistakes.correction: turns: 0.5 means half a rotation (180 degrees)
